note.p: Daughter of George Chaworth and his wife Anne of Annesley Hall, Nottinghamshire. Beloved of Lord Byron. Married John Musters (1777–1849; he took the additional surname Chaworth 1806–23), later of Colwick Hall, Nottinghamshire, in 1805. Mother of Charles Musters.

Biography of John Musters (1777–1849) and Mary Ann Musters (1786–1832) https://www.nottingham.ac.uk/manuscriptsandspecialcollections/collectionsindepth/family/chaworth-mustersofannesley/biographies/biographyofjohnmusters(1777-1849)andmaryannmusters(1786-1832).aspx, accessed 30 August 2017
